title: Microsoft | L60 | Noida
content:
Education: B.Tech CSE from Tier 2 College
Years of Experience: 2.2 Years
Prior Experience: SDET at Fintech

Previous Compensation - 17,00,000 (16,00,000 Base + 1,00,000 Annual Bonus)

Date of the Offer: December 2023
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: L60
Location: Noida India
Salary: 22,00,000
Signing Bonus: 2,00,000 for 1st year, 1,00,000 for 2nd Year
Stock bonus: 25000$ for 4 Years with Equal Vesting
Relocation Bonus : 3,84,333
Annual Cash Bonus: 0-20% (2,00,000 considering ~10% as optimal)
Benefits: All regular MSFT benefits
Other details: Couldn't negotiate higher as I had no other offers at the time

T.C: Around 35,00,000 for 1st Year

Interview Experience - https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/4361279/Microsoft-L60-Interview-Experience
